headline: How GAMCO’s Push for Equal Shareholder Treatment at Lennar (LEN) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: On October 13, 2025, GAMCO Investors Inc announced it had sent a letter to Lennar Corporation’s board raising concerns about Lennar’s recent exchange offer of Millrose Properties Class A shares, specifically urging for the inclusion or conversion of Class B shares in the transaction. This push by a major Class B shareholder draws attention to underlying shareholder rights and the potential for enhanced value creation through transaction structure adjustments. We'll explore how this investor...
